t = int(raw_input())
for case in range(t):
    freq = [int(x) for x in raw_input().split()]
    mini = 1000
    for i in range(1, 10):
        if freq[i] < mini:
            mini = freq[i]
            index = i
    if mini <= freq[0]:
        ans = str(index) * (mini + 1)
        print ans
    else:
        print 10 ** (mini)
